# Hallucinatory Terrain (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Glamer Spells|glamer]])

**Level:** [[4th Level Bard Spells|Bard 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, S, M (a stone, a twig, and a green leaf )

**Range:** Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)

**Area:** One 30-ft. cube/level (S)

**Duration:** 2 hours/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will disbelief (if interacted with)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 293

You make natural terrain look, sound, and smell like some other sort of natural terrain. Structures, equipment, and creatures within the area are not hidden or changed in appearance.
